title: 🎉 MoBank Full Release Notes
body:
We're excited to announce the full release of MoBank v1.0.0, packed with new features and improvements!

Additions

  • 🌓 Dark mode!
  • 🏦 Admins can adjust balance by instrument
  • 📬 In-app notifications system
  • 📢 Announcements system on homepage
  • 📊 Transactions history added to dashboard
  • 🎁 Gave free MoBucks to all registered users
  • 📃 Official Terms of Service Official Terms of Service
  • ✨ Particle effects on every page
  • 🥚 Two new homepage easter eggs

Changes

  • 🖥️ Complete UI overhaul for all pages
  • 🚀 Optimized performance
  • 🔗 Improved URL routing
  • 📈 Improved animations
  • ♿ Enhanced accessibility features

Fixes

  • 🏠 Fixed CLS issue on homepage
  • 🏦 Fixed error with admin transfers
  • 🔘 Fixed broken buttons
  • 🔒 Fixed security issues

Enjoy the new MoBank experience! Massive update coming soon. 🚀
